product_name: The North Face Warm Crew Neck Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Warm Crew Neck top for women features a polyester blend fabric that moves moisture away from your skin and dries quickly for prolonged comfort in the outdoors. Midweight moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams, which are designed to enhance motion; next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Warm Crew Neck top for women features a polyester blend fabric that moves moisture away from your skin and dries quickly for prolonged comfort in the outdoors.
